attributes.action: After 6 months they must work for their Benefit
attributes.additional_details: There are many people that play the system of not working but receive money for it.  Clearly this is not right and new laws should be introduced that if after 6 months a person has either refused a job and is still unemployed then they must do compulsory mundane work in order to receive money from Tax payers. If they refuse to do this then all Benefits must be withdrawn. It is completely unfair on the hard working people of this country to support the work shy
